trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Modesto
There was one other sighting in Modesto on or around November 9th 2007
Summary: Orange object comming from the North-west to to the South-west no noise
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my back yard Star Gazing when I saw this bright orange object comming from the North-west, at first I coundn't tell if it was a plane, because I could hear a faint noise, but as the object came closer I notice a plane behind it. As the object came closer it looked more narrow then an egg, and it was bright orange on the top and bottom and dark in the middle, and as it went by I could hear the plane very clearly but not any noise from the object, it lasted about 20 to 25 secounds and there were no blinking lights from the time I saw the object. Only when the object, was just out of sight I could see a orange light blinking on the right side(towards the west), and the object headed South-west. That about it.
